1.0.name: wordpress/advanced-random-posts-widget
1.0.description:
This plugin will enable a custom, flexible and advanced random posts widget. Allows you to display a list of random posts with thumbnail and excerpt also you can display it from all or a specific category.

Features Include:

  • Display thumbnails, with customizable size.
  • Display excerpt, with customizable length.
  • Display from all or a specific category.
  • Display post date.
  • Support get_the_image function.
  • Multiple widgets.

Ugly Image Sizes

This plugin creates custom image sizes. If you use images that were uploaded to the media library before you installed this plugin, please install Regenerate Thumbnails plugin to corrected the sizes.

Support

  • Go to forum support.
